edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train.AlignmentTemplateInstance

  • Packages that use AlignmentTemplateInstance 
    Package Description
    edu.stanford.nlp.mt.train
    Training routines for base generative models (e.g., phrase tables, lexical reordering models).
